chapter.para: An addon board for the Zeta SBC.

The Theory of Operation cannot hope to fully explain the entire board, but at least some helpful notes will be provided. Generally this should aim to exceed a simple list of features, without going into design detail. A good analogy is there is a physical walkthru at the start of the construction section, this section is more of a conceptual or theoretical walkthru.
